page.title: 16TRANSPORT ST.AGNES TO PERRAN
page.content: THE BUS SERVICE PASSES THROUGH THE AREA FOUR TIMES DAILY AND TWICE AT WEEKENDS. MOST OF THE PEOPLE OWN THEIR OWN CAR, MOTERBIKE, TRUCK OR BICYCLE.THE NEAREST TRAIN STATION IS AT TRURO WHICH IS 14 KILOMETRES AWAY. THERE WAS ONCE A RAILWAY LINE RUNNING FROM ST.AGNES TO PERRANPORTH AND THEN TO TRURO. IN THE SIXTIES IT BECAME DISUSED AND ITS SURROUNDINGS ARE NOW OVERGROWN GRASSLANDS.THOUGH PUBLIC TRANSPORT IS VERY LIMITED PEOPLE DO NEED TO TRAVEL BECAUSE AMENITIES,SUCH AS SHOPS, THEATRES, AND PUBLIC SERVICES ARE ALSO VERY LIMITED IN THE IMMEDIATE AREA.
